amendment.description: To set aside funds for the conduct of certain wood utilization research.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3482 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3482 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cassidy to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5500) To set aside funds for the conduct of certain wood utilization research.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3482 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cassidy to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3482 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
